code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient c/o 9 days h/o moderate difficulty walking (not checked), moderate difficulty climbing stairs, moderate thigh pain, Heart. NKDA. patient is a 52 year old white female engine mechanic. she does not smoke she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 64 in, Weight 176 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 173, DiastolicBP 107, Respiration 16, 2D echocardiogram panel shows left Ventricular Hypertrophy, ECG LVH, Heart = 3/6 systolic murmur over the right second intercostal space, S1 and S2 present, Skin = shiny appearance, dry, erythematous skin at lower extremities, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = absent dorsalis pulsation's B/L a:Hypertension p:administered metoprolol - 50 mg daily, performed 2D echocardiogram panel, ECG, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
